headline: Marriott International: 2025 May Be More Challenging Due To Macro Uncertainty
summary: Marriott International, Inc.'s Q1 '25 saw mixed results with revenue beats but lowered guidance due to economic uncertainties. Click for more on MAR stock here.

headline: Travel slowdown leads Marriott to cut 2025 guidance
summary: The revision follows early signs of softening demand, especially in North America, where the pace of post-pandemic travel recovery appears to be levelling off.

headline: Marriott International Inc (MAR) Q1 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Global Growth Amid ...
summary: Marriott International Inc (MAR) reports robust first quarter results with significant international RevPAR growth, despite macroeconomic uncertainties in key markets.
